question: Nebburu Narayana Hegde passed away in May 2019 in Mangaluru, Karnataka. What was he famous for?
explanation: Nebburu Narayana Hegde passed away in May 2019 in Mangaluru, Karnataka. He was a famous Yakshagana bhagwatha singerÂ  He was popularly called as Nebburu in Badgu Thittu school of Yakshagana.
